Exclusions - Exclusions
Confidential Information - Confidential Information does not include software code
software code - Confidential Information does not include software code

Keys - Keys and Access
Access - Keys and Access

Uptime - 4.1 Uptime
planned downtime - Synopsys will (a) have at least 99.5% uptime ("Service Availability"), as measured monthly, excluding planned downtime and any time necessary to implement updates, upgrades or modification to the Hosted Software, and (b) not experience more than two (2) instances of unscheduled downtime of more than one (1) hour each in any rolling thirty (30) day period
